name: Basil, Snap Pea And Rice Salad With Creamy Yogurt Dressing
keywords: low-fat yogurt, snap peas, white rice, spring
recipeIngredient: 6 medium cucumbers, peeled, halved lengthwise, seeded and cut across into 1/4-inch slices
1 small clove garlic, peeled and minced
1/2 teaspoon kosher salt, plus more to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Blanch sugar snaps in boiling salted water until crisp-tender, about 4 minutes. Drain, refresh under cold running water, drain and pat dry. Place in a bowl and toss with the olive oil, the salt and pepper.
Place the rice in a bowl and toss in the basil, lime juice, 1 teaspoon of salt and pepper.
Place the cucumbers in a bowl and toss with the lemon juice, salt and mint.

Place the salad greens in a large bowl and toss with the basil. Whisk together the yogurt, milk, olive oil, garlic, salt and pepper to taste. Stir in the scallions and place in a small bowl. Pass the dishes separately, letting guests build their own salads.
